title: Server lagging super hard
body: I entered a game 10minutes ago, it started lagging suddenly. First barely noticeable and then delay became really big. I'm paying shit load of money for fast, good and reliable internet, and I get these enormous lags that ruin games and its not even my fault

replies.body:
There's a few things that could be contributing to this, but the core concern would be what's happening in the connection between your network and our game servers to cause the lag.  The biggest help would be more information on the type of lag you're experiencing.  Are you seeing ping spikes or is everything just skipping around while your ping is stable?

As a first step, I'd recommend going through our [Connection Troubleshooting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) article.   The info in there help us better understand what the issue could be, with some potential fixes along the way :)
